entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Chetwynd
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:12 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chetwynd Airport 8:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -10.1°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Humidity: 81 %

Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
